fields.name: Unknown
fields.description: The status of the data is unknown.

fields.name: Expected
fields.description: The data is expected but not yet received.

fields.name: Submitted
fields.description: Some data has been submitted. Follow up with the data provider and if all the data has been provided, mark it as received

fields.name: Received
fields.description: The data has been received and is ready to be processed.

fields.name: Processing
fields.description: The data is currently being processed.

fields.name: Processed
fields.description: The data has been processed, and is ready for biochem loading

fields.name: Loading
fields.description: The data has been processed, and is ready for biochem validation and loading

fields.name: Loaded
fields.description: The data has been loaded to Biochem.

fields.name: Lab
fields.description: Samples are being processed in the lab.
